item.title: Processes Visualization
item.description: I don’t know if this happens to you, but for me, the need to take paper and pen when I’m going to explain something is innate. Even to understand a process, I need to make drawings to clarify my ideas. A few boxes, a couple of arrows and titles and voila. Does it happen to you? Well, that is one more way to use Visual Thinking. What happens is that it is easier to describe complex concepts with drawings and relationships than with words.
